name: Code: Realize - Wintertide Miracles
description: Third game, a second fan disc, in the Code: Realize series, containing after stories for the new routes from Future Blessings. There will also be IF stories, first Christmas for the original cast and an another story.

name: Radiant One
description:
Radiant One is an illusory, story-driven adventure with mystical elements.
Trying to escape from boring life and social media, one day Daniel found a mysterious book about lucid dreams. Very quickly he was able to do incredible things, create amazing worlds and fly during sleep until one day his dreams fell under the power of something inexplicable, something terrible conceived by the Universe itself... Help Daniel survive, pass the test and get enlightenment.

name: Asterix & Obelix XXL 3: The Crystal Menhir
description: Asterix & Obelix XXL 3: The Crystal Menhir is an action platformer and the only game in the XXL series which offers cooperative gameplay. Platforming is very different to the previous games in the series: the player can no longer jump vertically and should be more careful when moving around. The Crystal Menhir is used to clear obstacles from paths and interact with mechanisms.

name: The Wizards: Trials of Meliora
description: Sin descripci√≥n

name: Extreme Meatpunks Forever
description: A serial visual novel/mech brawler about four gay disasters beating up neonazis in giant robots made of meat. Get ready for the worst road trip of all time.

name: Nostoi
description: Nostoi is a narrative 3D puzzle and platformer game with a gameplay mechanics based on the physics and time manipulation. The game is about a boy who tries to escape his psychological trauma.

name: Alien Revival
description: Initially very much First Person Shooter, with collectables, series will develop into more adventure/task driven whilst still keeping the FPS element.Episode 1: Duty Calls - Join the government service as a lone agent... Society is breaking down, citizens have defied the law and armed themselves, anyone you meet is suspect, and a viable target, just get out there, collect various items and eliminate any and all opposition.

name: Wanderfog
description:
This multiplayer on-line game is about treasure hunters. 
   Do you like to wander alone through endless sands and stone deserts? Do you like the long quest for treasures and artifacts? Aren't you afraid of evil monsters and hidden robbers? Do you like craft and money? 
   Welcome to Wanderfog! Welcome to sands and rocks of the Dead Sea, treasure hunter!

name: Vinhomes Metropolis VR Interior
description: This is an experience where we expect you to spend about 5 minutes. Enjoy walking around and interacting with some parts of it just like you were there.

name: Poly Universe
description: Poly Universe is a survival city-building game in a galaxy where planets are only slightly larger than the colonists who inhabit them. Some of the base principles are like Banished, but there is more focus on modern technology.

name: Dude Simulator 2
description: Dude Simulator 2 is an open world sandbox game. This is a life simulator. The main objective is to enjoy what you are doing.

name: Blacksmith: Dark Times
description: Take on the role of blacksmith in the castle, create weapons and sell it to soldiers, or the army of darkness will capture the last castle, which the darkness has not yet found.

name: The Nature
description: You are a creature just like others. You have same needs, same abilities. There is just one difference; you can talk with the spirit of the nature. Take quests, gather items, make crafts, achieve your dreams, start a family, form a party and complete quests without dying.

name: Space Orb
description: The player controls the orb and has to navigate the different levels with a special gravity system. The levels gradually gets harder and as the player progresses more objects and obstacles is introduced to the player. The objective of the game is to collect space energy. When enough space energy is collected the portal will be activated and when the player moves through the portal it will take the player to the next level.

name: Survisland
description:
Survisland is a survival sandbox focused on Realism, located in a vast procedural generated world.
Taste every bitter and sweet as a lone man lost in wild islands, use your wit and strength to confront every challenge the Nature gives you.

name: Slamoids!
description: Slamoids! is an intense, re-playable, single player arcade score-chaser. Dodge and shoot slamoids as they hurtle across the screen, while also avoiding the ever growing and shrinking red ring that surrounds you. Slamoids! is a perfect coffee break game for when you only have a few minutes to spare.

name: Waterside Chirping
description: Follow Aileen through this visual novel with multiple endings, as she tries to discover what happened to her after mysteriously falling asleep. Strange things are appearing around her, could it be due to the curse...?

name: Primal Pursuit
description: Choose your clan, mount your tribal war animal and brace yourself to compete in the ancient death races of the giants!

name: Ever End
description:
Ever End is a super stylish interactive Manga-styled adventure told through cinematic storyboards and reflex testing QTE battles. 
 
In Ever End you follow the story of End and Zero, two sisters with a mysterious power that were captured, separated and experimented on by a shady organisation. End escaped and has now infiltrated the organisation, rescued her sister and is now attempting to escape. Zero is still a little dazed so won‚Äôt be much use in combat, so it looks like End will have to deal with any adversaries they meet on the way out. 
 
Ever End tells its story through some very stylish Manga-styled cutscenes and QTE-esque battles with enemies you meet. The combat isn‚Äôt exceptionally deep, but it is slightly more skill based and tactical that traditional QTE‚Äôs, with you able to heal, counter, dodge and attack. It also seems like you‚Äôll be able to make decisions that can affect the narrative at certain points in the game ‚Äì such as allowing enemies to live or deciding to kill them after a battle. 
 
It‚Äôs a promising game that feels like you‚Äôre playing through an interactive Manga comic. The artwork is excellent and the QTE style battle system really adds to the gameplay, turning what would be a fairly passive experience into an active one that really draws you into the adventure. Manga evolved.

name: VR Figure from Shining: Kirika Towa Alma
description:
Players can interact with and date Kirika, the titular character and one of the heroines in Shining Resonance.

In the Figure Viewing mode, players can view Kirika for a range of angles using VR while the Event Viewing mode allows one to play through dating events.

name: Taisen Hot Gimmick: Cosplay-Jan for Nintendo Switch
description: The No.1 Mahjong arcade game is coming back to Nintendo Switch!

name: Age of Space
description: Be the commander! Age of space offers a unique gaming experience by it's coined genre tower defence versus. You play as the commander of a massive capital spaceship and your job is to make preparations and tactical decisions to defeat the enemy commander.

name: Dead by Death
description: Dead by Death is a retro style platformer. The hero will explore dungeons where are full of traps and find out hidden secrets. To defeat monsters till you die or live for glory.

name: Dungeons of the Fallen
description: A 4 player fast paced hack n‚Äôslash set in fantasy world of Dolmadore. Grab epic loot, choose your spells and destroy all of the Fallen.

name: The Seven Stages
description: Inspired by William Shakespeare's poem All The World's A Stage comes the VR game: The Seven Stages. The player must escape each "room" that represents a stage of their life. They can escape the room by solving various puzzles of increasing difficulty.

name: Fastest Dialler
description:
Fastest Dialler is a multiplayer game which lets you compete with your friend via hotspot or a random opponent over the internet in a number dialling race! 
 
Each match in Fastest Dialler has 5 rounds. In each round, you and your opponent will be given a random 7-digit number. Type the number as fast as you can in order to proceed to the next round. The one who completes all the rounds first wins the match. 
 
Unlock achievements, godly fingers, titles, cars and make your opponents see what you are capable of. 
In Fastest Dialler, you represent not only yourself but your country too. Earn rewards offline and score online. 
 
Features 
‚Ä¢ Hotspot + Internet capability 
‚Ä¢ Intuitive. 
‚Ä¢ Increases your dialling speed. 
‚Ä¢ Beautiful cars to choose from. 
‚Ä¢ Godly Fingers 
‚Ä¢ Awesome soundtrack 
 
 
Things you can earn 
‚Ä¢ Godly Fingers automatically correct your wrong taps. You can use up to 5 godly fingers per match. 
‚Ä¢ Your title lets your opponent know who he/she is dealing with. 
‚Ä¢ You car represents your skills. Always have a great car, it makes your opponent nervous.

name: Override: Mech City Brawl
description: Pilot a diverse roster of epic mechs, each with their own play style, special moves, and finishers. Tower over your opponents and lay waste to entire cities underfoot in local and online versus, co-op, and more.

name: Darksburg
description: The medieval town of Darksburg is plagued by hordes of zombies, and it is up to the few breathing locals remaining to do the dirty work. In this top-down multiplayer action game, up to 4 players will team up to rid the city of the waves of undead that now occupy it. They will have a roster of characters to choose from, each featuring a unique set of skills and backgrounds, from the compassionate (but not overly so) Sister Abigail and the cheerful innkeeper and zombie slayer Runolf, to the sardonic bounty hunter Rose and the escaped werewolf (and man‚Äôs best friend) Varag. Teamplay and great reflexes will be the key to survive in this fast-paced, challenging title.

name: Atelier Totori: The Adventurer of Arland DX
description:
The second game in the Atelier Arland trilogy and 12th game in the main Atelier franchise
The Arland trilogy is the 5th set of games in the Atelier franchise.

This is a port of the 2012 PlayStation Vita enhanced version, known as Atelier Totori Plus internationally, with all DLC included.

name: Atelier Rorona: The Alchemist of Arland DX
description:
The first game in the Atelier Arland trilogy and 11th game in the main Atelier franchise
The Arland trilogy is the 5th set of games in the Atelier franchise.

This is a port of the 2013 PlayStation 3 and Vita remake, known as Atelier Rorona Plus internationally, with all DLC included.

name: Atelier Meruru: The Apprentice of Arland DX
description:
The third game in the Atelier Arland trilogy and 13th game in the main Atelier franchise
The Arland trilogy is the 5th set of games in the Atelier franchise.

This is a port of the 2013 Vita enhanced version, known as Atelier Meruru Plus internationally, with all DLC included.

name: Escape Lala
description:
You wake up inside a magical cave, full of mysteries. You remember nothing, but you know one thing for sure, you need to escape! Escape Lala.

Escape Lala is a point-and-click adventure game / Escape room with a nostalgic feel.

Escape Lala is not the regular Escape the Room game, it is full of charming handcrafted pixel-art graphics and animations. And it contains puzzles with magical twists that take inspiration from classic point-and-click adventure games.

Struggling with a puzzle? Look for the gold coins scattered around the cave and use them to reveal hints! Try to find them all and use them sparingly to get a better score at the end of the game.

- Discover the secrets of Lala
- Collect items and use them to Escape Lala
- Lovely pixel-art graphics inspired by the classic point-and-click adventure games from the 90‚Äôs

Miss the good old point-and-click adventure games? Then you'll definitely love Escape Lala!

We'd love to hear your feedback! Feel free to contact us:
duckbearlab@gmail.com

name: Love
description: Love is a massively multiplayer online role-playing game (MMORPG) created by Eskil Steenberg. Unlike most such games, the content in Love is almost entirely procedurally generated. Another major difference is that there are no predetermined quests; instead, the gameplay is emergent from the interactions of players with each other, with NPCs and the environment. Love uses skill-based progression and any benefits gained from defeating NPC enemies apply to all players from the same settlement.

name: It's Paper Guy!
description: It's cute, let's cut!

name: Cube Racer Free to play
description:
Cube Racer is a roundbased multiplayer racing game. After every round you played, every player is having the possibility to build obstacles on the racetrack to make the next round more interesting and exciting! Iportant: Every player has to drive through the same parts of obstacles every round! 
 
We hope we will see some of you online :)!

name: 4Sight
description:
4Sight is a real-time PVP squad tactics game set in a dystopian near-future dominated by warring corporations and cutthroat warlords. 4Sight blends tense and rich tactical gameplay with adrenaline-filled action in exciting PvP matches.

Players build and command a squad of four deadly mercenaries using an isometric perspective to battle other opponents in decisive arena matches. The squad members come in all shapes and sizes, with players selecting them from six available classes.

Choosing the right tactics, building a squad fit for the mission, planning ahead and taking advantage of cover and elevation on the battlefield is the key to success in 4Sight. The right use of the unique abilities and gadgets of different classes can turn the tide of battle and ensure victory.

name: Startrail Destiny
description: Startrail Destiny sees players take command of different types of spaceships, from nimble fighters to massive battlecruisers, and fight it out against in 5v5 teams in a fight for precious resources and the survival of humankind. Players‚Äô crafts can be customised with hundreds of different modules, from rapid-fire turrets to advanced defensive shields. In Startrail Destiny, the discovery of the Startrail changed everything, allowing giant motherships to travel the galaxy instantaneously and colonise rich, new planets. However, conflict was never far away, and players find themselves locked in a desperate struggle to be the first to discover the end of the Startrail.

name: Vanguard of Demise
description: A 2D Ultimate Shooter Being Developed By Powerworks Games

name: Grim Dawn: Forgotten Gods
description: Forgotten Gods takes the apocalyptic fantasy world of Grim Dawn to distant lands with a massive new chapter in humanity‚Äôs struggle against otherworldly and divine threats. Unleash new mobility powers, gather powerful new items and venture into a brand-new game mode with endless replayability.

name: Starship Avenger: Operation Take Back Earth
description:
Starship Avenger is a defense shooter action game.

Blast off the weapons installed on Avenger to defeat the enemies who come to destroy mankind‚Äôs ultimate weapon! Don‚Äôt let them cross the Dead Line or they‚Äôll cause damage to Thor‚Äôs Hammer!

Charge your energy gauge by defeating enemies and release the limiter to blast a full-scale attack to destroy them all at once! The energy gauge can be used to create a temporarily barrier surrounding Avenger! Use your gauge wisely depending on the situation to get ahead!

Power up the battleship and try to attain a perfect shield and kill ratio in all stages! There are three different difficulties to choose from, making it enjoyable for beginners and advanced players of defense action games!

name: Magic Knight Rayearth
description:
The balance in the magical world of Cefiro is supported by the prayers of the lovely princess Emerald. When the evil Sage Master imprisoned her, the existence of the entire world was endangered. Using her spiritual powers, the princess contacted three Japanese high-school girls, Hikaru, Umi, and Fuu, turned them into Magic Knights, and summoned them to Cefiro, where their goal is to save her and to restore the balance.

This adaptation of the eponymous manga and anime series is an action game with light role-playing elements, somewhat similar in style to Zelda games. The protagonists are all the three girls, but the player can controls only one of them at a time. Each one has advantages and disadvantages, as well as different fighting styles: Hikaru uses swords, Umi a rapier, and Fuu a bow. The player advances through the game by exploring the world, talking to non-playable characters, and fighting enemies in real-time combat. There is no experience system; new abilities (among them swimming and jumping) are gained as dictated by the story, and must be used in certain points in order to advance.

name: Magic Knight Rayearth
description: This game is based on the anime and manga by manga artists CLAMP.

name: Mahou Kishi Rayearth 2nd: The Missing Colors
description: Mahou Kishi Rayearth 2nd: The Missing Colors is a Role-Playing game. The plot of the game is that Cefiro's Colors have been stolen by the Color Thief, you then have to go through the three structures to recapture the colors.

name: Daruber Muss Man Schweigen
description: A saucy sci-fi population management game, with lashings of transhumanism and transformation fetishism.

name: Psikyo Collection Vol. 1
description: Arc System Works has announced Psikyo Collection Vol. 1 for Switch, which includes the currently available Nintendo eShop titles Strikers 1945 for Nintendo Switch, Sol Divide: Sword of Darkness for Nintendo Switch, Samurai Aces for Nintendo Switch, and Gunbird for Nintendo Switch. Currently, it has only been confirmed for release in Korea in 2018.

name: Remnant: From the Ashes
description:
The world is in ruins. Only a remnant of mankind remains, hunted to near extinction by horrors from another world. As one of the few survivors left, you will venture into portals to fantastic realms to gather the resources and firepower needed to fight back and retake what was lost.

Remnant: From the Ashes is a third-person survival-action game set in a post-apocalyptic world overrun by mythical creatures. The game provides players and up to three of their friends with a unique, customizable gameplay experience filled with intense shooting and melee combat, gear and weapon crafting, character progression and dynamically-generated levels that offer an infinite number of ways to explore and take on deadly monsters and epic bosses.

name: A Rite from the Stars
description: A Rite from the Stars is a game about overcoming and magic. A 3D Graphic Adventure that takes pointing and clicking to a paradisiacal yet dangerous setting. A dynamic world where pixel hunts, pointless long walks or even inventories are nowhere to be found. The game also offers the freedom to play each path in the order desired by the player.

name: Strikers 1945 for Nintendo Switch
description:
A revolution broke out in shooting games in 1995. The Japanese brand "Psikyo" introduced a new enemy's attack, "Spread bullets" not seen before then, and the history of a new shooting game began.

If you are a shooting game fan, "Psikyo shooting" that everyone knows is revived! Shoot!

name: Gunbird for Nintendo Switch
description:
Who called "Gunbird (Adventurer of the sky)."

In the 19th century Europe, five Gunbirdss are challenging. They keep each wish to themselves and collect "A magic mirror of Atra." Finally, whose wish will be granted with the power of mirror? It depends on your playing skill‚Ä¶

name: Shironeko New Project
description: Shironeko New Project is a co-op action RPG based on the mobile game Shironeko Project but will have a new story with new characters.

name: God Wars 2
description: Kadokawa Games announced God Wars 2, a sequel to its Japanese legends and folklore-themed tactical RPG.

name: Fall of Light: Darkest Edition
description: Fall of Light is a story-driven dungeon crawler set in a world consumed by darkness, where an old warrior leads his daughter towards the last remnants of sunlight. Only together will they be strong enough to defeat the enemies born from the Shadow.

name: Dead or School
description:
Zombies conquered the land of Tokyo.
Without hope, in underground shelters, people lived quietly.

Hisako, a girl who grew up underground, heard the word ‚Äúschool‚Äù from her grandmother.

School is where children play and learn. It is a paradise for young people. The best place to spend their youth.

Hisako dreamed of this ‚Äúschool‚Äù, and one day, she was on an underground train heading above ground. What awaits her? Despair...

Defeat enemies, grow your own character.
Collect items, create your own most powerful weapons!
Hack and Slash X Girl's action

name: Dies irae: Amantes Amentes for Nintendo Switch
description: The Switch version, titled Dies irae: Amantes Amentes for Nintendo Switch, inclues the additional scenario ‚ÄúSaoshyant Desatile: The Savior Who Became God,‚Äù which is a prequel to the smartphone game Dies irae: Pantheon.

name: Dies irae: Pantheon
description: Sin descripci√≥n

name: Stancie
description: Sin descripci√≥n

name: Skorpulac
description: Make your way though 5 enemy-infested levels - armed only with a spear - in this bite-sized old-school sidescroller.

name: Project Oasis World
description:
Project Oasis World is a new genre type built with a massive multiplayer online role-playing foundation and player ran economies in mind. Hundreds of players will be interacting with each other in an open world freedom environment with one goal: living. You choose who you are, what you wear, what you drive and how you earn a living.

You can choose to become a law enforcer taking down other players who chose the life of crime. How about a more harmonious role of agricultural perfecting your corn, barley or marijuana crops providing other players and businesses with foods and goods.

After a long day of work, you should relax by grabbing some lunch with friends, or attending a local dance club and bar. Top it off with a weekend getaway fishing trip. You ultimately decide how you choose to live your life in the Project Oasis World.

We want to provide a fun outlet for folks to enjoy themselves in a virtual world. We also want to provide a platform for folks who may suffer from circumstances that prevents them from fulfilling an average life. Whether you suffer from physical or mental ailments, such as depression, any kind of social anxiety, or basically anything that prevents you from doing basic activities, Project Oasis World can be used as a resource to help people live the life they want to live.

name: Babel Sword
description:
Babel Sword is a shoot 'em up/versus fighting game hybrid created by Shiyo Kakuge using the M.U.G.E.N fighting game engine for the PC. It was only released in Japan. The player controls a selectable M.A.R.S., mechs not unlike gundams, to take one of five sides in a conflict over Earth's resources. The game is notable for being the only hybrid of the two genres made for the engine, an irony given the engine for fighting games was originally designed for shooting games. The game requires the engine be downloaded separately and to have the EXE and dlls put in the root folder to function (this is due to the engine's EULA). 
 
Gameplay is not unlike that of WarTech: Senko no Ronde. The player selects a pilot and a M.A.R.S. (Machines of Assured Resourceful Structures, the game's gundam-like mechs). While pilot selection has no effect on the gameplay at all, each mech fights in a very different manner, making for variety.

name: Beyond the Frontier
description: Rumored To Be An Open Universe RPG

name: Dengeki Gakuen RPG: Cross of Venus Special
description:
It's an enhanced remake produced in commemoration of the fifteenth anniversary of ASCII Media Works light novel imprint Dengeki Bunko.

The player assumes the role of an unnamed protagonist attending Dengeki Academy who stumbles into a fight between heroines from Dengeki Bunko novel worlds and the evil organization Zetsumu. The reality-based world of Dengeki Academy and the novel worlds have become connected and the player is able to help the Dengeki Bunko heroines fight the Zetsumu by going between the worlds.

name: Kingdoms Forlorn
description: Kingdoms Forlorn is an upcoming first person turn-based rpg for Android and iOS. Inspired by classic games like Might and Magic and Eye of the Beholder series, the game takes place in a rich fictional world full of danger, secrets, excitement and ancient knowledge. Apart from the cities, the entire world is procedurally generated with random dungeons and dungeon layouts events and enemies.

name: Ziq
description: Run, dodge, jump, pull pickups, switch polarity and die constantly! You get to do all this while being heckled for your constant mistakes! "ZIQ" is an arcade runner that features polarity-switching gameplay. Switch ZIQ's polarity to make it safely past obstacles or in some cases destroy them. Perform pickup sequences, maintain chains, destroy obstacles and time your pulls to take advantage of the in depth scoring system while you compete on the global leaderboard!

name: Deconstruction
description: Deconstruction is a fast-paced, hardcore, vertical shooting game.

name: Worbital
description: Worbital is a real-time strategic artillery game, peppered with a heavy dose of cosmic chaos. The goal: be the last civilization standing. With the shifting gravity on your side, aim your cannons, blast your enemies and enjoy the fireworks!

name: Squad Z
description: Squad Z is a post-apocalyptic game of survival. Players from around the world battle in an immersive, breathtaking experience of diverse maps and game modes.

name: Silent Footsteps
description: A point 'n' click adventure game, made with real photographs.

name: A tractor
description: An old-fashioned, serious, social-economic simulation game that combines trading, vehicles, mini-games and blowing things up. And tractors.

name: Echoes of War: The Last Heartbeat
description: Echoes of War is an action packed shooter with stratigic elements for virtual reality devices. Set up your defences, lay waste to hundreds of drones and mechs and use all you can salvage to repair your ship.

name: Super Nosebleed Land
description: Jump on walls and avoid deadly sawblades to escape Nosebleed Land. This hard-as-nails indie platformer will distract you from your homework for a while, or just make you kinda mad.

name: Shadow Blood VR
description: Shadowblood VR is a first-person action game based on fantasy. You have to defend continent of Nar by defeating Akand,corrupted malevolent dragon, and monster as a blood knight.

name: Higher Ground
description: Higher Ground is a 3D racing-like adventure game. You are Hoffman, a genius scientist who left behind in the polluted Earth, dedicates himself to escape to Mars. With your "friend" Swimmy, a one-manned spaceship, you will escape from Megaquake and harsh natural conditions.

name: Kitty Play
description:
Who said being a kitten would be easy?
Sure, the owners feed you and the bowl is full of water! But growing up is so hard.
After all, in order to grow tall and strong, you'll have to develop your skills by playing learning games, and sometimes you just want to mess around!

name: Detached: Non-VR Edition
description: Detached, a suspenseful interstellar duel that demands tactics and skill to survive, is now available in a non-VR version! Separated from your unit, you must make smart decisions and race to safety in this visceral exploration of deep space. Strap yourself into your EVA spacesuit for thrilling gameplay and fight for victory in cross-platform PvP mode!

name: Krampus is Home
description: Krampus is Home is a chilling first-person survival horror experience inspired by Central European folklore. You‚Äôll step into the shoes of Sebastian, a teenager left home alone on Christmas Eve, only to be hunted by Krampus and his sinister helpers. With intense stealth mechanics, survival strategies, and action-packed gameplay, you‚Äôll need to evade Krampus‚Äôs grasp and fight for your survival. Uncover the dark mystery behind your abduction and find a way to escape from Krampus‚Äôs realm.

name: Champions of Titan
description: Champions of Titan is a Sci-Fi Action MMORPG with fast-paced MOBA style combat. A master combination of both worlds, the strategy combat and skills combos from MOBA world and the action and freedom from the MMORPG world.

name: Trek: Travel Around the World
description: In Trek: Travel Around the World, the adventure starts in your new Helsinki apartment. Each experience after that transports you to a new destination where real-world locations are blended with magical phenomenon: Catching fishes in the Archipelago in order to fill the sky with the majestic Northern Lights, powering the city of Helsinki as a giant in the capital of Finland, and tracing the stars to highlight the constellations in the sky.

name: Professor Li's Answer-Question
description: Professor Li's Answer-Question is a IQ test game. By answering questions, you can test your IQ , hope you perform well.

name: Endless Fables 3: Dark Moor
description: During her new adventure, Pamela Cavendish goes to a misty and mysterious Scotland where a seemingly innocent landscape of moor quickly reveals its dark nature. Spectre from the past and ghostly sounds will force her to follow the amazing legend of the Red Moon.

name: Dungeon Rankers
description: Roguelike RPG meets Battle Royal! Fast-paced retro action!

name: Miami Cruise
description: Miami Cruise is a game inspired by retrowave aesthetics. Take a ride, and chill out.

name: Kidz
description:
Kidz is 2D Side Scrolling style, featuring different mechanic each episode, including Action Horror, Point & Click, Parkour!
3 Kids from a different universe, They're facing the same problem.
The adult says this's the best for you, It's mean they want us to fulfill their undone dream, Or just let us walk our own path?
I'm your kid, But not your kid.

name: Road Z Survival: The Last Winter
description: Nuclear fallouts have settled, and the long, dark winter has begun! Wild ride through the world of nuclear fallouts, cold death, zombies, and postapo—Åalypse. Survival craft in a zombie game like never before - master both the craft of survival and extreme driving across frozen lands.

name: Horny Fighter
description: Player is Ivanka Horny. Women fighter who needs to fight against hungry mens in this meme fighter

name: Mortar Howl
description: Take on the role of an arrow from a mortar and destroy all your enemies

name: Nurikabe
description: Nurikabe is a minimalist logic puzzle from Japan. Relax as you solve these challenging puzzles.

name: Mutation Phase
description: Mutation Phase is a horror-shooter with a first-person view, which narrates the consequences of experiments with sound waves. You have to survive among hordes of mutants and get out of the danger zone.

name: Small Pixel
description:
A small pixel sandbox game with lots of interesting stuff,
Find food, live, and explore

name: Goinund
description: Goinund ‚Äî an arena shooter with the ability to grow, full of magic and battles with demons. To survive is to destroy all.

name: Granny's Grantastic Granventure
description: While babysitting her grandchildren one evening, Beatrice fell asleep and they wandered off. Now she must proceed through a world filled with challenging obstacles, puzzling puzzles, and dank memes to be reunited with her little rascals.

name: It's You: A Breakup Story
description: It's You: A Breakup Story is a narrative-driven breakup game where it is them, not you, even when it doesn't feel that way. The game only has one ending; you decide how to get there.

name: Paradise Checkers VR
description:
Attention! 
Game only for Oculus 
 
Paradise checkers VR is the board game that should be known on the World, 
Still may be occur a little errors, 
Also computer A.I. still is poor, but work in progress and in few month should be fine with this, but I dont promise 
To room will be add furniture and other things, so game should be pretty

name: Lucy Got Problems
description: Lucy, an airhead succubus spy, was sent into the elven forest to... um... what was she supposed to do?! Find out how to survive in the forest full of dangers and lustful elves. And do your best to save the day!

name: BearHammer
description: Explore the beautiful island of Bearonia and defend Bears, Turtles, and Rabbits from the minions of the evil Toad King. Wield the powerful BearHammer and send enemies flying with ragdoll physics. Feel powerful. Explore the world. Prepare Your Bear.

name: The Warrior War
description: Try to survive in a chaotic war scenario!

name: Steamulator 2019
description: The legends that brought you I Can't Believe It's Not Gambling present... STEAMULATOR 2019. Balance players, developers, money, and morality as you curate all your favorite games in this epic storefront challenge!

name: Horror Rollercoaster
description: Looking to get scared at high speeds? Look no further! This rollercoaster game will take your breath away!

name: Code Romantic
description: Code Romantic is a computer science puzzle game wrapped in a science fiction love story.

name: Mahjong Pretty Manga Girls
description: Play smartly to unlock the most pretty girls

name: Liminal
description: Liminal is a mind-bending puzzle game where your perspective changes every time you walk through a door.

name: Lynne
description: Lynne is a short story about the scariest thing in the world - being a teenager.

name: Blood Money
description: Blood Money is a 290,000 word interactive novel by Hannah Powell-Smith, where your choices control the story. It's entirely text-based‚Äîwithout graphics or sound effects‚Äîand fueled by the vast, unstoppable power of your imagination.

name: Punch Line: Cheermancy Edition
description: The Rice Exclusive Cheermancy Edition comes with a copy of the game, a collector's box, an artbook, the official soundtrack, Chiranosuke's cat collar and pendant, a Japanese Punch Line logo keychain, and a full-size rubber pigeon head mask!

name: Enter the Flesh Again
description: Sin descripci√≥n

name: MoonQuest
description: MoonQuest is a procedurally-generated adventure game with roguelike and minecraftian gameplay. Each game presents a new world to explore in your quest to illuminate the endless night. Seek out the lost forest, delve into the spider caves, storm the castle of the Silver King, discover vast seams of gold ore, and craft a hat of such splendour that the cosmos will be jealous.

name: The Rose Garden
description: Sin descripci√≥n

name: Chogue
description: Chogue is a hybrid game created out of two masterpieces, chess and Rogue. Why should the knight, queen and other chess pieces be stuck on a small chessboard? Apply your chess skills to the exploration of randomly generated dungeons!

name: Hag's Castle
description:
Hag‚Äôs Castle is a 3d action adventure game set in the age of Scottish myth and legend, with strange dragons, evil old crones and a cast of crusty creatures from the bog. There is a castle to explore, and monsters to fight and traps to avoid!.
You will explore dark dungeons, foosty wine cellars, opulent gardens and lofty towers, as you attempt a daring rescue and find a way to escape from the clutches of the evil harridan, Madam Hag.
You must swing the legendary Moonsword to defeat enemies, and harness the power of a wizard‚Äôs familiar to cast magical spells.
The demonic witchcraft of Madam Hag must be defeated!.

name: BimbleBorn
description: Sin descripci√≥n

name: Nishan Shaman
description: The Legend of Nishan Shaman is a traditional tale passed down by Northeastern Chinese minority tribes for thousands of years. The tale is about how a female shaman named Nishan saved the soul of a young boy from evil.

name: Rekkr
description: Rekkr is a 4-episode total conversion, created by Matthew Little (Revae), with a full soundtrack created by Tom Jensen (HexenMapper), sound effects provided by TerminusEst13, additional textures by Chris Kassap (lupinx-Kassman), and additional mapping by Angry Saint, Brayden Hart (AD_79), Bzzrak Ktazzz, Chris Kassap, James Paddock (Jimmy), Jaws in Space, SuperCupcakeTactics, TerminusEst13, and Velcrosasquatch. The mod is distributed as both a PWAD for Ultimate Doom (or Freedoom, since all content is replaced it does not matter which one) and a stand-alone IWAD version.

name: Holedown
description:
Dig deep underground by shooting balls and breaking blocks, traversing your way to the planet cores. With limited shots per round and some blocks fixed firmly to the wall, thoughtfully strategize and aim for maximum impact. Knock down as many blocks as possible while collecting crystals for upgrades and getting deeper beneath the surface.
Choose your ideal upgrades such as more starting balls, more shots per round, or storing more crystals, based on your play style and overall strategy. Work your way into the procedurally generated planets with a delightful spectacle of bouncing as you get closer to the planet‚Äôs core.

Balance your plan between ball bouncing patterns and unpredictable, surprising bounces in this mesmerizing and curious game oozing with charm. Immerse yourself in a world of extravagant minimalistic art while jamming out to an original space acid soundtrack as you feel the satisfaction of digging further underground.

Features:
‚Ä¢ Six planets to dig through
‚Ä¢ Original soundtrack of seven diverse and space-acid themed tunes
‚Ä¢ A tight experience with 5+ hours of gameplay‚Äô
‚Ä¢ Intuitive, one-handed play
‚Ä¢ Endless play mode
‚Ä¢ 5 achievements
‚Ä¢ 11 leaderboards
‚Ä¢ Split view support
‚Ä¢ Toggle for screen shake

name: Touhou Soujinengi V: The Genius of Sappheiros
description:
Touhou Soujinengi: The Genius of Sappheiros is a fan-made Touhou Project game and a traditional turn-based RPG released at Comiket 78, heavily influenced by traditional console roleplaying games such as the SaGa Series. Despite being an RPG, it follows a traditional Touhou stage-based format, with each stage being its own dungeon. The game is made using the Unity game engine.

An updated version was announced for the PlayStation Vita version, under the name of "Touhou Soujinengi V", as part of Play, Doujin!

name: ACA Neo Geo: The Super Spy
description:
The Super Spy is an action game released by SNK in 1990. Punch, kick, and use guns to fight off terrorists as you make your way through the building to rescue their captives.
Defeating enemies earns experience, which can be used in a Role Playing Game-like feature to level up.

name: Ketto Majiku
description: Sin descripci√≥n

name: Turn Run
description:
Simple ! One Tap ! Addictive !

Turn Run is a simple addictive indie game. Collecting all the asteroids will be your mission impossible !

You will control your rocket with casual one tap button.

This challanging twisted geometry game, is your source of funky casual unlimited (endless) fun !

This game will make you fly into rage because of trippy impossible challanging levels !

Game contains two modes. Normal Mode & Endless Mode !

Select your rocket and mode !

name: Hearthstone: The Boomsday Project
description: Can you feel it? That electric tension on the wind, the reek of ozone and Khorium, the distant rumble of explosions; there‚Äôs science in the air! Word around the inn is that Dr. Boom has returned to his secret laboratory in the Netherstorm. No one knows exactly what the mad genius will unleash, but a lot of very, VERY strange cards have found their way into decks around here lately: mechanical amalgamations, eerie crystals, revolting, lab-grown monstrosities‚Ä¶ the good doctor and his esteemed colleagues are working on something big! Time to venture into the Netherstorm, find the lab, and uncover what these maniacs are up to.

name: Philosophic Love
description: Sin descripci√≥n

name: Race Arcade
description: Race Arcade is the ultimate top down racing game with a strong retro feeling and super smooth gameplay. This fresh and evolved racing experience seamlessly combines all the best parts from the good old racing games with the most recent technologies.

name: Avem888 VR
description: This classic arcade style flying VR game takes you through a everchanging landscape of objects you should avoid.

name: Alliance Aligned
description: Sin descripci√≥n

name: VR Enigma
description: Enigma is a thoughtful, horror theme VR escape game developed by BadPixel Studio. Trapped in a dark, suspicious room, surrounded by mysterious puzzles, you have to fully use your intelligence to get yourself out. Go, and figure out the truth of the "Enigma".

name: Chemically Bonded
description: Enter the melancholic life of a Japanese high school student, as you soon become entwined in the dispute between two female students. Learn more about their past as you piece together their relationship and mend their bond, all whilst forming bonds of your own.

name: Speed Box
description: This game is a simple idea to move boxes and avoid obstacles, but this game is more difficult and addictive than you think. Avoid obstacles that get faster and get items, aim for high score!

name: Dragonfly Chronicles
description: Dragonfly Chronicles is a 2D Action-Adventure game full of challenge and fun for one single player.

name: Parallel Arena
description: Parallel arena is an old-school classic shooter with a unique teleport capability between two parallel worlds. Kill your opponents deftly moving around the location, and switching between worlds, while you see the players in a parallel world but can not kill them until you are together.

name: Country Park
description: Immerse yourself in an unforgettable world of park simulation! Become the main character who walks around the beautiful country park and get a lot of emotions and impressions. Become the most frequent visitor to the park and learn every millimeter!

name: Romancing Monarchy
description: Prove your right to succeed the throne in a non-linear fantasy JRPG! As the Prince of Achaea, it is your duty to obtain the Mandate of Heaven to continue your family's rule over Achaea. After assembling a party of four at Ruth's Tavern, you set off to explore the world in search of the Mandate.

name: Bvrger Van
description: Bvrger Van is a frantic and fast-paced Virtual Reality game where you are tasked with the upkeep of your burger van business. Cook burgers, hotdogs, and much more as you journey your way to becoming the best burger van in town!

name: Train Tower Defense
description: Train Tower Defense is a reverse Tower-Defense game! The thing here is, YOU would need to cross the entire map on your train and destroy the Enemies. Only 7% of the people can do this! Think YOU can do it?

name: Hell Knights
description: Hell Knights is a small but fun Bullet Hell Shoot'em Up with a four player Co op mode. Made by some Indie dude, living in a dungeon.

name: Usual John
description: Usual John is a retro action shooter, in the style of old dandy games and NES.The game contains several different locations and many kinds of enemies, each has its own abilities and characteristics.

name: PaulPaul - Act 1
description: Paul is a VR narrative experience where players try to figure out their identity through exploring surroundings and events in a futuristic and often changing environment.

name: Monopolist: Technological Revolution
description:
Imagine being a monopolist of the late 19th and early 20th centuries. 
In the game Monopolist: Technological revolution - wins the one who will become the first millionaire or eliminate other players from the game, 
forcing them to go bankrupt.

name: Life After the Living
description: FPS Zombie Survival Game set in a post apocalyptic world.

name: Mercenary Leto
description: A science-fantasy action platformer with a nostalgic pixel look. Travel the galaxy with a cast of memorable and endearing characters, ride one fluffy dragon, and stumble onto a plot to stop dragon poachers.

name: Chrono Project
description: The Chrono project is a 2.5D side scroller game, set in a fantasy world, with the magical Chrono and the technological Robo. The game features a powerful time rewinding mechanic. Use it to explore different timelines and eventually save or damn the world.

name: Trials of Ascension: Exile
description: Trials of Ascension: Exile is a hardcore sandbox fantasy game where you will play as a human mastering your skills, evolve for the hunt as a Raknar, or defy all odds to grow as a powerful dragon!

name: Russi.a Simulator
description: –Øussia Simulator

name: One Hunt
description: One Hunt is a simplistic survival shooter game. At the moment there are only three things that can kill you; wolves, weather, and the one you hunt. In order to survive, you must collect wood to create fires, find shells to keep your shotgun loaded, and avoid detection from the one you hunt.

name: L-Way
description: L-Way is a minimalistic labyrinth-puzzle game.

name: Speedy Girls - Dream Team
description: In Speedy Girls: Dream Team you become a sponsor who provides financial assistance to prospective women drivers and also gives them advice which track and which car to choose for each race.

name: Mojo
description: "Mojo‚Äù is a new version of the famous game ‚Äú2048‚Äù, an original approach to this well-known puzzle. Several beautiful girls will keep you company during the game. The more points you get, the less clothes remain on the girls.

name: Zkiller
description: Zkiller is a first person shooter survival horror game set in an apocalypse world in which waves of brutal zombies try to kill you. Equip yourself with 30+ high-poly realistic weapons and blast over 21+ different types of infected beings.

name: The Chaotic Workshop
description: Welcome to The Chaotic Workshop, a cartoon puzzle sandbox game which challenges you to solve its puzzles by any means necessary. From rockets to pinball bouncers, tennis ball cannons to proximity mines, it is up to you of how to get the job done. With over 100 items, 80 levels and a full-fledged sandbox level editor, the game becomes whatever you're imagination can make it.

name: Total 15
description: Challenge your problem-solving skills in this game.

name: Picross Bonbon - Nonogram
description: 160 sweet puzzles from the world over in Picross Bonbon!

name: Dangerous Skies 80's edition
description: Enter the world of Dangerous skies, a shoot em up inspired by the mythical space invaders, you will face ten fantastic levels in full 80s style.

name: Second Hazardous Course
description: Hardcore platformer, the plot of which tells about the subjects who are trained in the complex hazardous course for unknown purposes, which will be learned from in-game stories and records.

name: Before Nightfall
description:
It‚Äôs a small survival game, when you will be tested for speed and prudence.
Challenge the deadly cold

name: Koral
description: Dive into the beautiful underwater world as a current who's mission is bring back to life coral reefs. Solve puzzles to heal them and bring back the beauty of the ocean.

name: Extreme Drifters
description: The greatest drifting tournament starts! It is a dangerous race for the highly qualified racers. And that's your chance to show who is the best drifter. Compete with the mightiest rivals on the racing tracks of 2 cities, complete tasks and win!

name: Car Crash Online
description: Try to imagine what it means to be crushed, flattened, smeared on the asphalt!

name: Haunted Halls: Revenge of Doctor Blackmore - Collector's Edition
description: Prepare for a mind-bending journey into the realm of the weird in Haunted Halls: Revenge of Dr. Blackmore! Brace yourself for the unexpected in this exciting Hidden Object adventure!

name: Whispered Secrets: Golden Silence - Collector's Edition
description: A man has gone missing in the town of Rockshire, but the townspeople deny he was ever there. What dark secret are they hiding?

name: Love Chronicles: A Winter's Spell - Collector's Edition
description: A dark wizard awakens the ice queen using your daughter!

name: Surface: Return to Another World - Collector's Edition
description: The people of Lightfalls are disappearing, and it‚Äôs up to you to save them!

name: Nous
description: If there is a simulator, and you are trying it, there is a strong chance that it simulates you rather than you simulate it‚Ä¶There is also a strong chance that you are not trying it, it actually tries you...Welcome to Nous...In philosophy, Nous means the faculty of intellectual apprehension and of intuitive thought.

name: Motor Gladiators
description: Enter the intense auto combat tournament known as Motor Gladiators. Aim for the engines or the tires to cripple your opponents and gain the advantage. Win events and earn money to buy new vehicles, engines and weapons, as you make your way from being an amateur up to becoming world champion.

name: Full Metal Renegade
description: Defend this city - become a superhero in iron armor!

name: Urban Explorer Golf
description: Urban Explorer Golf is a unique Puzzle Game in which you need a calm hand, sharp eyes and the ability to maneuver balls into a hole. But beware, this is not the golf experience you are used to see. Play with unique physical balltypes in locations all around the city, and maybe even somewhere else...

name: Reptiles: In Hunt
description: Reptiles: In Hunt gives you the opportunity to face dangerous dinosaurs in world that has fallen. It is a mix of survival and action. Hunt, explore, acquire resources, build new weapons and fight with huge reptiles and dangerous neo humans.

name: Put Anna
description: Ordinary Japanese girl-sorceress comes to Russia‚Ä¶

name: Ding Dong VR
description: Ding Dong VR is a neon-infused one button arcade game. It is an addictive 'just-one-more-round' score chaser adapted to be played in Virtual Reality.

name: Anime Fight in the Arena of Death
description:
Anime Fight in the Arena of Death is a duel with yourself. Where it is necessary in unequal combat, to fight with crowds of opponents.
A fun and addictive game in the style of beat'em'up with amazing physics. Perform dizzying tricks to defeat all opponents.
Gaining points, you rise higher and higher, confronting simultaneously more and more enemies.

name: Arcane Golf
description: Arcane Golf is a miniature golf puzzle game set in a fantasy world full of dungeons, dangers, gems, and geometry. Play across 200 levels set in 4 unique courses inspired by classic adventure games!

name: The Queen of Blackwood High
description: The new girl, Brooke, has an unlucky start at Blackwood High when she accidentally makes enemies with the school's big, bad bully, Kendra. Despite not knowing her, Brooke has a feeling that there is more to Kendra than she's letting everyone else see and is determined to find out what it is.

name: Whirlygig
description: Whirlygig is a block building game which consists of 4 unique grids - Fall, Winter, Spring, and Summer. Blocks move upward in Fall, to the right in Winter, downward in Spring, and to the left in Summer. Every 5 turns, a new grid is randomly selected as the next grid to play in. Game level, speed, and scores increase as you destroy more rows of blocks. Build and destroy until the Whirlygig becomes too fast to handle.

name: Grid Gunner
description: A hardcore sci-fi rally racing game where winning comes second to survival and reaching the finish line in one piece is your goal.

name: Kinkshamed
description: Follow Jackson and Morgan as they meet up with old friends and new connections and demonstrate their new modeling venture is a laugh riot.

name: Puzzles & Board Games Mega Collection
description: 10 of the most popular Puzzles and Board Games all in one collection.

name: PackageRun
description: A challenging platformer that looks easy to play on the surface. You play as a computer screen defeating enemies, going through hard to navigate levels, defeating bosses and collecting upgrades to get stronger and play better.

name: Study of Unusual: Forest of Secrets
description: In Study of Unusual: Forest of Secrets you are secret agent which went to unusual forest. You need to find out the reason of people disappearing. During the investigation you need to unravel the mystery of the forest, collecting notes and documents of disappeared people and try to stay alive.

name: Solar Fighters
description: Help Gaia fight battles to protect her prestige given by the Sun. Gaia is the most lucky among the others 4 personas in the Solar System, this leads to a rebellion intended to stole the Gaia's glory.

name: Color Party
description: Arrange all the pieces so that together were only pieces that have at least one matching color.

name: Sniper Tanks
description:
Sniper Tanks is an arena for tanks, where the strongest wins!
Participate in battles on tanks, where the strongest wins! Destroy enemy tanks to gain points. Do not forget to repair the tank in time, otherwise the loss is inevitable.

name: Epic Game Maker
description: Create interesting levels and share them with other players. Play any levels online!

name: Digital Resistance
description: "Digital Resistance" is a hardcore platformer where the Dog, the leader of the "Digital Resistance", must resist a powerful organization, get through the local networks its central computer, destroy it and save the world!

name: Onmyoji Arena
description: Onmyoji Arena is part the hit Onmyoji series from NetEase. It builds on the rich character base from the original work to create a new MOBA experience. The game retains the elegant Japanese aesthetics and original voice talents to faithfully recreate Kyoto in the Heian era. With innovative map designs, a Fog of War mode, and an even larger set of Shikigami skills, players are in for more fun and greater challenges as they battle to reign supreme. The paid amulet system is now replaced by a free Onmyodo system. This levels the playing field. Players from all over the world are connected, and the all-new 3v3v3 Battle Royale will provide players with a fun and novel MOBA experience.

name: Spacebourne
description: Spacebourne is an open space exploration game with Rpg elements. Its world consists of different factions at war. You as an expert pilot need to choose your side or be on no one's side and raise an army of your own. Load up your weapons, Ready your ship and warp to advanture.

name: Toki Time Trial
description: What could you accomplish if you had the ability to stop time? Become a master of time and space as you take on temporal puzzles in this first person puzzle platformer.

name: YAPP2: Yet Another Pushing Puzzler 2
description: Yet Another Pushing Puzzler 2 it is yet another pushing puzzler, in which you have to push boxes onto specific locations. What makes this game unique is: It's 3D.

name: Don't Notice Me
description: Don't Notice Me is an adventure puzzle game where you play as Mika Kittinger, a normal teen girl who just wants to get back a love letter she gave to her crush. All you need to do is sneak into his room and find the letter before anyone notices. You may need to find his address, break into his house and crack the codes on all the locks he seems to have in his room. You may even get an opportunity to snoop through his phone and computer while you're there.

name: Tod Stein
description: Tod Stein - a space shooter about the brave surfer Ivan, who during his hard life has to fly into a dangerous nebula at high speeds..

name: Burden of Proof
description: Inspired by works such as Ace Attorney and Danganronpa, Burden of Proof brings a new 3D courtroom adventure to PC, Mac, and Linux! Investigate the crime scene, interrogate witnesses, gather evidence, and solve puzzles in the courtroom to present your case and uncover the mysteries.

name: Banzo: Marks of Slavery
description:
Banzo: Marks of Slavery is a turn-based strategy and resource management game. The player assumes the role of the Queen Zeferina, who commands the Quilombo do Urubu, in the interior of Bahia. Zeferina is responsible for the organization, food production, defense of the quilombo, attacking the farms, and freeing enslaved people.

Use all available resources, train warriors, fight tough battles, conduct raids to free your enslaved brothers, and make decisions about who can join the quilombo. Be strategic and shrewd, but above all, have faith in the deities who will help you. Resist!

name: Hentai Memory
description: Open the image by solving the puzzle under relaxing music.

name: To the Core
description:
To the Core is a roguelite action-platforming speedrunner.
Run, jump and dash your way through levels filled with obstacles and hazards. Fight through heaps of enemies to save your father and set record times.

name: Tiger Tank 59 I
description: This is a tank war game, players need to control their tanks, through the enemy lines, break the enemy base, or defeat the enemy tanks, open the way for the Allied offensive.

name: Anceder
description: Be in the shoot-them-up ! Anceder is a classic Arcade shoot-them-up (shmup) in VR (Virtual Reality, also playable in non-VR). Choose your ship and try to make the best score you can. "Insert coin" ;-)

name: MultiTaskMaster
description:
MultiTaskMaster is a brain melting arcade game in which you juggle four games at once. 
 
Become the MultiTaskMaster by completing 48 different games in 12 different locations.

name: Stick Arena
description: Take down your opponents with The Flamethrower, Chain Gun, Railgun, Chain Saw, Laser Sword, and Tesla Helmet. Or, kick it oldschool with the original Katana, AK-47, Sledgehammer, Shotgun, Baseball Bat, or Glock. Can you go all the way to the top?

name: Strive for Infinity
description: Mortal hearts have always lusted for money and power, technology is no longer able to satisfy their desires. Terrifying alien knowledge awaits being unveiled. Will you use it to overcome the limitations of this universe and reach the true infinity?!

name: Switch - Black & White
description: Minimalistic game in the style "Black & White". Game that will test your reaction.

name: Devastator Arena
description: The distant future. Shrouded with a sandy veil the burning desert hides a terrible place called Devastator Arena. This is the last refuge for maniacs and assassins of all stripes, who are brought here into this bloody slaughterhouse

name: 1 Hit Kill
description:
The bad guys take one hit... So do you!
This 80's-style Top-Down Shooter tests your patience!

name: Fugue in Void
description: An interactive experience in which you can explore all kinds of mysterious places and dive into a world full of atmosphere. Let this experience unfold in your head. Let it inspire you.

name: Shimmer
description:
Shimmer is a desert island survival game set on a number of fictional island. Your task is to survive whatever the islands throw at you, lack of food, thirst, the dangers that lurk in the waters and the natural elements!

I wanted to create something that gives players a hardcore survival challenge but at the same time something a little different. I am a firm believer that games are one of the best forms of ‚Äòescapism‚Äô, a way to shut off from the real-world. So along with the survival elements you will also have the ability to create a new home for yourself on your island!

The challenge is not just one of escape but trying to make a new life for yourself, living off the islands resources and building your own home.

name: Cro Magnon
description:
Europe, 39000 BC.

A group of people have arrived at a location suitable for a settlement. The lands are rich and fertile, but not uninhabited.

You will take command of a newly formed clan of Cro Magnon, in the final days of the Neanderthals. Your goal is survival and dominance.

name: Legion's Crawl
description: Descend the dungeon and slay the evil! Legion's Crawl is a combination of classic rougelike principle and modern 3D environment with intuitive GUI. Just choose your hero and difficulty, keep moving forward until you meet the last boss. Defeat it and you win! It's that simple. But, with randomly generated dungeons and your choice of player build, there are infinite ways to win ...and lose. Test your planning skill and adaptability to the limit, or just choose the easiest difficulty and enjoy the walk. You decide how you enjoy this game.

name: Meritocracy of the Oni & Blade
description: Her home town burned to ground and her parents killed by the "Red Demon", Aika Amagami was left orphaned and alone. Forging her path in life with the blade, what fate awaits her? Be it hope? Depravity? Or perhaps corruption? A multi ending RPG with 3 routes and 10 endings!

name: Jewel Match Solitaire
description: Take a fantastical journey across the kingdom in this beautiful new Solitaire with 200 levels, multiple variants like Klondike, Freecell, and more! Build 5 majestic castles and search every last level for gems and coins to buy new upgrades and power-ups.

name: Asterlode
description: Mine, build, trade and explore your way through the Solar System! Tunnel into the depths of asteroids and moons. Go on missions, fight, collect rare ships and weapons or uncover the mysteries of space. The choice is yours in this 2D sci-fi adventure!

name: GolemRush
description: "Golem Rush" is a casual action game that bombs bounce around and golems are blown away.

name: Fractal Chicken
description: Explore, explode, and edit your way through multiple infinite voxel worlds, look at fractals, have a good time! Play multiple game modes! Learn the wisdom of the Fractal Chicken! Punish the Demon Lizards on behalf of the Fractal Chicken! Actually includes Fractals!

name: Space Hamster in Turmoil
description: Space Hamster in Turmoil is a shoot 'em up featuring a customizable ship, optional & unorthodox mechanics, 7 interesting bosses, and a short story that takes place one year after the extinction of our species.

name: Project 59
description: You joined a secret agency. Someone is ordering you to carry out covert operations. There are advanced equipment and weapons at your disposal. You have to eliminate mutant creatures as you go through your mission objectives. But you realize things are not as they seem. There is something wrong in the system.

name: Tango 5 Reloaded: Grid Action Heroes
description: 'Tango 5 Reloaded' is a PvP tactical action PC game on grid-based maps where players are required to teamwork, strategize, and articulately utilize certain heroes and skills in order to dominate the battle arena! Join the Open-Beta Now!

name: Dark Tales: Edgar Allan Poe's The Tell-Tale Heart - Collector's Edition
description: A scream in the night... a brutal crime... a mysterious figure with eyes red as blood. Can you get to the heart of this shocking murder?

name: Seed of Amaranth
description: What does it take to be a hero, and at what cost? In the irradiated kingdom of Amantia, six characters struggle with this question, bringing them into conflict and unexpected friendships with each other.

name: Nerved
description: Please save my soul...Come closer...don't be afraid...When I was alive, I was working on paranormal events...Help me solve the murder cases that I've been working on...Help me uncover the mystery of this forest...

name: Empire
description: In a traditional fantasy RPG, play as several characters in a time of war as they fight for freedom while a greater darkness grows amidst the chaos.

name: Fall... in Love
description: "Fall...in Love" is the first love simulation game in Cantonese voice over under the brand Blue Tea College. Characters are based on real-life persons instead of entirely fictional. This is Demo version (chapter0-1). Please help to fill the survey after the demo for the full game making.

name: Mars Troopers
description: Mars Troopers must defeat the enemy to save the universe. Super exciting shooting game, waiting for you to challenge! Action games, Arcade games, Crime games, fight games and for those fans of guns weapon games.20+ Alien Monsters Boss, 9 different alien stars, Waiting for you to conquer.

name: Bike Dash Excite!
description: Check out this simple motorcycle racing minigame created with Pixel Game Maker MV! Tame your wild and jacked-up bike to fly through the various stages and rub your awesome clear times in your opponents‚Äô faces!

name: The Last Hex
description: An RPG Roguelike with card based combat. The dead arise and only you can stand against them. Travel the lands to slay monsters, acquire new cards, survive harrowing encounters and claim powerful equipment to enhance your deck. A final showdown with The Lost awaits you at...The Last Hex!

name: Trouble VR
description: Lie and bluff your way to victory in this online multiplayer VR game inspired by the likes of Mafia and Trouble in Terrorist Town!

name: Rogue Heist
description: ROGUE HEIST is a 6v6 crew-based shooter where you fight against an opponent crew to set up ambush and steal as many packages as possible from a convoy. Choose and Customise your Crew. Choose your Role (Sniper/Spotter/Assault).

name: King of Phoenix
description: King of Phoenix is a comedic adult harem dating sim set in sunny Phoenix, Arizona. Play as Dan Miller, a British journalist who is forced to take a layover in Phoenix and meets a couple of very lovely ladies there. What treasures lie in wait for him in this city? Money? Friendship? Passion? Waifus?

name: Infinity Racer
description: Infinity Racer is designed to be a fast, simple to control and satisfying to flight experience. Enjoy the simple and colorful atmosphere and master your reflexes.

name: Eye Contact: Hanako
description: "Mojo: Hanako‚Äù is a new version of the famous game ‚Äú2048‚Äù, an original approach to this well-known puzzle. Beautiful Hanako will keep you company during the game. The more points you get, the less clothes remain on the girl.

name: Music Racer
description: Music Racer is a musical arcade game, where you get to race at full speed while dodging obstacles to the rhythm of the music.

name: Memory Trainer
description: A beautiful game for practice of memory. Open the cards and remember their location to find a pair of the same and remove them from the Board.

name: Battle of Worldviews

name: George's Memories Ep.1
description: ¬´It‚Äôs all blurry‚Ä¶ You could hear some voices from far-far away. Were you walking or crawling or flying? Then you were awake after a sudden punch¬ª.

name: Cast Away
description: Living in a desert island, with weapons, you can build your own houses, explore desert islands, catch prey and destroy zombies.

name: Project Defense

You have to repel the enemy's attacks on the main base, for this you will need a variety of turrets, from the machine gun to the lasers and missile salvos. description:

name: Puzzle: Cats & Dogs

The teams compete to see who can make contact with all of their agents first. Spymasters give one-word clues that can point to multiple words on the board. Their teammates try to guess words of the right color while avoiding those that belong to the opposing team. And everyone wants to avoid the assassin.

The game was released in North America and Europe in 1991 and in Japan on January 25, 1991, and re-released on the Wii Virtual Console exclusively in Japan on May 20, 2008.

name: Koikoi
description:
This boy is not alone.
Because you are with him!

name: Brimstone Brawlers
description: Brimstone Brawlers is an action packed arena beat‚Äôem up, where players battle it out as peculiar characters dwelling in the fantasy industrial city of Brimstone. name: Gene Rain

„Éª14 magical girls can act separately.

name: Battlefield Armor
description: Sin descripci√≥n

Each of the six tours offers their own unique systems and challenges as you work your way from the junior circuit to the pro tour and eventually ride off into the sunset on the senior tour. The creatures lurking within these pyramids are not too happy with Larry, and don‚Äôt intend to let their rare artifacts be stolen so easily! Will Larry succeed in plundering the pyramids of all of their valuables? Or will he become as lost as the civilizations that left these relics behind? 
 
Pyramid Plunder is an exciting variation on the Pac-Man theme, featuring: 
Large, scrolling mazes 
A variety of power-up items 
Genuine chip generated soundtrack 
In-game radar 
Dash button for a quick getaway

Celebrating the 20th Anniversary of the Digimon Anime, Digimon Survive presents a brand-new adventure set in a mysterious world with characters designed by Uichi Ukumo, and music by the much-acclaimed Tomoki Miyoshi.

Digimon Survive sees a brand-new group of teenagers, led by Takuma Momozuka, get lost on a school camping trip, finding them transported to a strange new world of monsters and danger.

As they fight their way back home through an animated world of difficult decisions and deadly battles, players‚Äô choices throughout the game will impact the evolution of their monster allies, and the final ending. Battles in the game are fought in 2D, in a more classic SRPG style.

Play as Vasily, an elite operative who once worked for one of the biggest arms industry corporations in the world. Officially working in security, you were tasked with infiltration, assassination, extortion and even torture. When eventually the corporation decided to get rid of you, you manage to narrowly escape to a secluded monastery deep in the snowy mountains. 
 
For 20 years you tried to find peace and harmony amogst your fellow monks, but you are still too haunted by your murderous past to find either. Now after all of these years the corporation is finally closing-in on your location, and in so doing they have given you one last shot at redemption.

You have to fly challenging courses at exotic locations and achieve the best time or score. Various disciplines and a variety of game elements and collectibles provide further variety. 
 
More than 50 different courses and many different aircraft: Fly with an Airplane, a Jetpack, and a Hang-Glider in 2 variants, as well as a parachute. 7 different challenge types. Plus unlockable courses, where you can explore a sunny island. Play with 8 characters and a unique soundtrack with 11 different music pieces that provide for a summerly and exotic flair.

The puzzles however, start easy and increase in difficulty as you progress, and it‚Äôs not all about the size of the level, nor the amount of moves it takes to finish them, it‚Äôs about the tricks used to solve them.
